title: PSA: Again, Legendary Snowball skin event doesn't start until the 23rd

embed.description: December 10 - January 7 A chill in the air; A handful of ice A present for you; How lovely, how nice! It's round and it's cold; Packed tight and frozen A face full of frost for the unlucky chosen The battle starts now; Put some cold in your fist Snowdown arrives with an aerial twist So throw on some gloves and step into the sun This Snowdown's about snowballs and friends having fun!

body: So don't go buying a bunch of Legendary skins yet if you're expecting a free Mystery Skin out of it. The event starts on the 23rd (wait for them to announce it) and ends on Jan. 7th.

replies.body: If you have questions about it - I created an [FAQ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/oixW2ira-faq-legendary-snowball-december-23rd-january-7th) that's pinned to the top of this board. ^-^
Did I throw you a snowball? I hit my gifting limit for teh day :(
I didn't get any from you. It's okay, though! How Do You Meta spammed me with icons this morning, so I've got the set. :P I appreciate the thought, though!

Kind of off point, but can anyone tell me why the new Azir skin is so low quality? 

It's a 1350 skin along with the Elderwood Hecarim (beautiful skin). But when you put it up to other 1350's like Star Guardian Lux it looks like it was drawn into the game with a crayon.

Don't get the wrong idea tho, I LOVE my Necromancer Azir so much, it just seems like he deserves to look a little more detailed for 1350.

Idk what exactly you dislike about it. It has enough features to classify as a 1350;

* New model and textures for not only Azir, but his Sand Soldiers and Sun Disc, too!
* New green, ethereal particles!
* New sound effects for all of his skills!
* New voice processing!
* New recall animation where he calls forth the trapped spirits in his staff!

SG Lux has;

* Completely new model (ribbons, stars and cute things!)
* New particles for abilities! (stars and sparkles!)
* New recall! (she spins around magically!)
* New ability SFX! (can you even get more magical?)
* Some new animations! (a cute new idle, and a new dance! Can you tell where the dance is from?) 

975 models typically only get a new recall and *maybe* particles. They had to give Azir models for all his soldiers and sun disc too.
True, but I just cant get over looking at him from ahead and just seeing that pastel white/textureless face..
It's not a face it's a mask/helmet.

Yeah, I am such a moron xD I just thought "okay, gotta wait till the 23rd to buy Battlecast Cho Gath" and 30 minutes later I bought it, having totally forgotten that it was date-restricted...CURSE YOU, MY DAMN SHORT TIME MEMORY
my friend just mystery gifted that icon :C
